titleStmt.title: Fragment of a word-list (words in zeta)

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Meta: in the title, take out 'alphabetic'; add in Biblio 65050; add in General Notes: 'The list is written across the fibers; the other side contains parts of two columns, written along the fibers. The initial letters of the first column are lost; the second is of words beginning with kappa. According to ed.pr., at the bottom of the first column can be read in succession: ]νδ̣υνη, ] ̣ν ϊωσηφ̣, ]τος//, ]ομ̣ον//, ]ων//, and ]ο̣διν. In the second column, nothing is legible except a few initial kappa's and three successive beginnings κρι̣τ̣ ̣ ̣[, κα̣[ or κο̣[, and κοπ ̣ ̣.' Text: l. 8, change 'corr' encoding to 'reg' encoding for <:ζωμάριστον|corr|(ζωμάλιστρο(ν)):>; l. 15: change the encoding to: vestig.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Meta: in the title, take out 'alphabetic'; add in Biblio 65050; add in General Notes: 'The list is written across the fibers; the other side contains parts of two columns, written along the fibers. The initial letters of the first column are lost; the second is of words beginning with kappa. According to ed.pr., at the bottom of the first column can be read in succession: ]νδ̣υνη, ] ̣ν ϊωσηφ̣, ]τος//, ]ομ̣ον//, ]ων//, and ]ο̣διν. In the second column, nothing is legible except a few initial kappa's and three successive beginnings κρι̣τ̣ ̣ ̣[, κα̣[ or κο̣[, and κοπ ̣ ̣.' Text: l. 8, change 'corr' encoding to 'reg' encoding for <:ζωμάριστον|corr|(ζωμάλιστρο(ν)):>; l. 15: change the encoding to: vestig.
